name: Rheumatoid Arthritis, Labs
description:
First diagnosis / prior to methotrexate
ORDER-
- baseline complete blood count, serum creatinine, aminotransferases,
erythrocyte sedimentation rate (ESR), and C-reactive protein (CRP)
in all patients q6months Chest Xray, LFTs

name: Rheumatoid Arthritis, Assessment
description:
- Symptoms controlled, keep on mtx ‰ Õ f/u 3 months for LFTs
- Not controlled, uptitrate mtx 2.5 mg and add NSAID and prednisolone
10mg po daily‰ Õ f/u in 1 week
- Still not controlled on prednis 10 ‰ Õ titrate up--> f/u 1 week
- Severe intractable pain / febrile / ill appearing ‰ Õ refer to ER/IPD
